title: National Art Honor Society
extracurricular details: An organization recognizing students with exceptional artistic talent and dedication to visual arts through community service and leadership opportunities.

title: FRC Robotics
extracurricular details: A competitive robotics program where teams build and program large-scale robots to compete in challenging field games and missions.

title: FTC Robotics
extracurricular details: A robotics competition program where smaller teams design, build, and program more compact robots to compete in annual challenges.

title: Mu Alpha Theta
extracurricular details: A mathematics honor society that celebrates excellence in mathematics through competitions, tutoring, and mathematical exploration.

title: Future Business Leaders of America
extracurricular details: An organization preparing students for careers in business through leadership development, academic competitions, and networking opportunities.

title: Speech and Debate
extracurricular details: A competitive program where students develop public speaking, argumentation, and critical thinking skills through various speaking and debate events.

title: National Honor Society
extracurricular details: A prestigious organization recognizing students who demonstrate excellence in scholarship, leadership, service, and character.

title: Volleyball
extracurricular details: A team sport where players hit a ball over a net, combining athleticism, strategy, and teamwork.

title: Soccer
extracurricular details: A globally popular team sport where players work together to score goals by maneuvering a ball without using their hands.

title: Baseball
extracurricular details: America's pastime where teams compete by hitting, throwing, and catching a ball while scoring runs around four bases.

title: Basketball
extracurricular details: A fast-paced team sport where players dribble, pass, and shoot a ball to score points through elevated hoops.

title: Cheerleading
extracurricular details: A high-energy activity combining dance, acrobatics, and crowd leadership to support school sports and compete in championships.

title: Model United Nations
extracurricular details: A simulation program where students represent different countries to debate global issues and practice diplomacy.

title: Key Club
extracurricular details: A student-led service organization focused on community service, leadership development, and character building.

title: Girls Who Code
extracurricular details: An organization empowering young women to explore computer science and technology through coding projects and mentorship.

title: Future Educators of America
extracurricular details: A club for students interested in teaching careers, providing classroom experience and educational leadership opportunities.

title: Gay Straight Alliance
extracurricular details: A student organization promoting understanding, support, and advocacy for LGBTQ+ students and their allies.

title: Mock Trial
extracurricular details: A competitive program where students act as attorneys and witnesses to argue court cases in simulated trials.

title: Theatre
extracurricular details: A performing arts program where students explore acting, directing, and technical theatre through productions and performances.

title: Band
extracurricular details: A musical ensemble where students play wind, brass, and percussion instruments to perform various styles of music.

title: Choir
extracurricular details: A vocal music group where students develop singing skills and perform various styles of choral music.

title: Orchestra
extracurricular details: An ensemble where students perform classical and contemporary music using string, wind, and percussion instruments.

title: Science Olympiad
extracurricular details: A competitive program where students participate in various science-related challenges and laboratory events.

title: Technology Student Association
extracurricular details: An organization promoting technology education through competitive events and leadership development.

title: Swimming
extracurricular details: An athletic program where students compete in various swimming strokes and relay events.

title: Tennis
extracurricular details: A racquet sport where players compete individually or in doubles matches on a court.

title: Football
extracurricular details: A team sport combining strategy, athleticism, and coordination as players advance the ball to score touchdowns.

title: Photography Club
extracurricular details: A creative organization where students learn camera techniques, photo editing, and artistic composition.

title: Future Farmers of America
extracurricular details: An organization preparing students for careers in agriculture through hands-on experience and leadership development.

title: Science, Engineering, Communication, Mathematics, and Enrichment
extracurricular details: An interdisciplinary program integrating STEM fields through project-based learning and enrichment activities.

title: National English Honor Society
extracurricular details: An organization recognizing high school students who demonstrate exceptional ability in English language, literature, and writing.

title: Health Occupations Students of America
extracurricular details: A program preparing students for careers in healthcare through competitions, leadership development, and hands-on medical experience.
